mapper.select: SELECT f.uuid filmId, f.film_name filmName, info.film_en_name filmEnName, f.img_address imgAddress, f.film_score score, CONCAT(info.film_score_num, ' 万人评分') scoreNum, f.film_box_office totalBox, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( show_name SEPARATOR ',' ) FROM mooc_cat_dict_t WHERE FIND_IN_SET( uuid, ( SELECT REPLACE ( TRIM( BOTH '#' FROM f.film_cats ), '#', ',' ) ) ) ) info01, CONCAT( ( SELECT show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t dict WHERE dict.uuid = f.film_source ), " / ", info.film_length, " 分钟" ) info02, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT( f.film_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ), ' ', ( SELECT show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t dict WHERE dict.uuid = f.film_source ), '上映' ) info03 FROM mooc_film_t f, mooc_film_info_t info WHERE info.film_id = f.UUID AND f.UUID = #{id} ;

SELECT f.uuid filmId, f.film_name filmName, info.film_en_name filmEnName, f.img_address imgAddress, f.film_score score, CONCAT(info.film_score_num, ' 万人评分') scoreNum, f.film_box_office totalBox, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( show_name SEPARATOR ',' ) FROM mooc_cat_dict_t WHERE FIND_IN_SET( uuid, ( SELECT REPLACE ( TRIM( BOTH '#' FROM f.film_cats ), '#', ',' ) ) ) ) info01, CONCAT( ( SELECT show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t dict WHERE dict.uuid = f.film_source ), " / ", info.film_length, " 分钟" ) info02, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT( f.film_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ), ' ', ( SELECT show_name FROM mooc_source_dict_t dict WHERE dict.uuid = f.film_source ), '上映' ) info03 FROM mooc_film_t f, mooc_film_info_t info WHERE info.film_id = f.UUID AND f.film_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name} ,'%') ;
